# Go poloniex datas reader

*Description: This library for readout history trade datas and orders from https://www.coinegg.com

## Installation


```shell
go get -u github.com/jojopoper/CoinReader/coinegg/...
```

## Usage


```go
cd exsample
go build main.go
main
```
